name: Grumpy Pete and The Lost Key
name_original: Grumpy Pete and The Lost Key
description:
Grumpy Pete and The Lost Key is a 3D platformer based on rotation!

Pete has lost his key to his home, and now has to go to the locksmith.
The locksmith is, however, very far away, and Pete has to collect both food for energy, and coins for the locksmith. 

I hope you will enjoy my game!
